Bullshit "Analysis" of Iran Missile Strike -- am seeing quite a few talking heads -- including some who should know better -- opining that Iran intentionally missed.

Bullshit. We just had more than twenty "bullets" fly by American ears, and some talking heads seem to be brushing it off. Missiles struck inside base. Those are obvious kill shots that missed.

How many people reading this have been on the receiving end of missile strikes? Many people who come to my page have -- as have I. Usually they miss, but we took thousands of casualties from IDF (mortars/rockets) in Iraq/Afghanistan.

These were ballistic missiles, not cruise missiles, and those were pretty good shots given the range.

This ain't over.
